title: League opens but wont launch after clicking launch
body: I can open the league client but when i click launch when it should bring me to the login screen it just dosent open at all.Ive tried reinstalling and ive tried deleting stuff from my league folder and ive tried hextech repair tool ive tried almost everything if not everything please help

replies.body: Are you on a PC or Mac?  If you're on a PC, a setting may have changed that is blocking the patcher from launching.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should restore that access.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I have  a pc and none of that worked

Aw, sorry to hear!  No worries, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) when you get a chance, which will yield some logs for you.  Attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can assist you directly in figuring this out.  We'll see you there!

its a wide probolem i have never lahged all day i am lagging checked my cables tested them out with a tester  checked my wow connection ran it to there servers lags every where else and overseas is awsome. its a server issue new ptch/update

This might not be related to connection at all if you're on PC.  Most cases of the patcher not launching is due to overzealous settings blocking files from being accessed.  The below guide can help with that, but if it doesn't work for you do let me know.  It would also be worth restarting your PC as well in case something crashed in the background!
